title: Phone is hanging up during phone calls. Have tried factory resetting phone but it still occurs
content: Phone keeps on hanging up during phone calls tried factory resetting. And I have gone into permissions do not have any unusual apps using permissions for phone calls. I've gone to the help centre and it seems that a lot of people are having the same problem they suggest resetting phone and going into phone permissions.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
